title: Ecuador
summary: Citi has been operating in Ecuador since 1960. There are two main branches – one in Quito, the other in Guayaquil. We are proud to be the only international bank in the country, with the best risk qualification in the Ecuadorian Market, AAA. Our major asset is our global network, which combined with the professionalism of our people, differentiates us from our local competitors.
tag-2: Citi is the global bank with a presence in Ecuador, the leader in transactional solutions for the corporate segment.

tag-6: Public Relations Manager at Citibank N.A. Ecuador
